cookie.message: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze traffic, and display relevant ads.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Toolkit lab. We are committed to protecting your privacy.

collection.title: 2. Data Collection
collection.process_content: Your files never leave your device. All video processing is performed entirely in your browser using WebAssembly (ffmpeg.wasm). We do not upload, store, or have access to any videos or GIFs you create.
collection.analytics_content: We use the following third-party services:

use.title: 3. How We Use Information
use.content: The limited data we collect is used to:

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, rectify, or erase your personal data.

thirdparty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdparty.content: We use Google Analytics and Google AdSense. These services may collect data according to their own privacy policies. We recommend reviewing their policies for more information.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can control them via browser settings.

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.content: Since all processing happens in your browser, your files are inherently secure.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.content: Cookies may be retained for up to 2 years. We do not store any of your files on our servers as all processing occurs locally in your browser.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children.

changes.title: 10. Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, please contact us at:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Toolkit Lab, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

service.title: 2. Description of Service
service.content: Toolkit Lab provides free online tools for video and image conversion, AI-powered content generation, and other utilities. All processing is performed in your browser using WebAssembly technology.

prohibited.title: 3. Prohibited Uses
prohibited.content: You agree not to use our services for:

list.copyright: Infringing on intellectual property rights of others
list.abuse: Attempting to abuse, attack, or disrupt our services

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Our services are provided 'as is' without any warranties. We do not guarantee uninterrupted access or error-free operation. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of our services.

ip.title: 5. Intellectual Property
ip.content: The Toolkit Lab website, including its design, code, and branding, is protected by copyright. You may not copy, modify, or distribute our materials without permission.

userContent.title: 6. User Generated Content
userContent.content: You retain all rights to files you process through our tools. We do not claim ownership of any content you create. Since processing occurs locally in your browser, we never access or store your files.

ads.title: 7. Advertising
ads.content: Our service displays advertisements through Google AdSense to support free operation. By using our services, you consent to the display of advertisements.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, please contact us at:
